name: Capitalism 2
description: Create and control the business empire of your dreams. This in-depth strategy game covers almost every aspect of business that could be encountered in the real world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98 / ME / 2000 / XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 98 / ME / 2000 / XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
